summary: Skip Lipman, a suburban stay at home dad, embarks on an epic quest to topple a mighty empire in a full-contact Live Action Role Playing Game known as Darkon.
cast: Skip Lipman|Kenyon Wells|Daniel McArthur|Rebecca Thurmond|James Iddings|Gary Black|Domenic Prince|Andrew Mattingly|Frank Kanach|Leah Kanach|Teasa Glenn|Michael Wells|Nancy Lee Wells
title: Darkon
